content.detailedDescription:
I was at home.About 8:20pm my dog needed to go outside.I took the dog out
to my backyard.I was thinking to myself what a beautiful clear night it was
as i looked up at the sky.I was noticed how many stars were out.As i was
looking at the night sky,i see this upside down v shaped object(chevron?)
moving at a slow pace toward town.It had white lights on the underside of it.At first i thought it was a plane.But then i thought what a weird shaped
plane and it didn't make a sound! it was dark outside,but the object was
darker than the night sky.If that makes any sense! i watched it move away
toward town.Probably only 20 or so seconds.I was in total disbelief.What did i see?? my heart was pounding so hard.I was shaking.I ran inside with my dog.I told my family what i just witnessed.Now everyone went outside on
the front steps of the house to try and see the object.Or where could this
object have gone? i told them that it went toward town.Which for us is only
a few streets away.But it was already gone.I went back outside to the backyard where i first witnessed this object.Hoping that it would come back
so i could see it again.But nothing happened.I didn't see anything.All i know is i wont be able to sleep tonight.It's all i can think about right
now.Im still shaken by it,but excited at the same time! there is no doubt
in my mind that i was witness to a ufo.
content.summary: Took my dog out on my patio in the backyard.Looked up and noticed a v shaped object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We had just pulled into the driveway and were getting out of the truck when a dark dome shaped object appeared overhead.

it appeared black in color and had an antenna on the top with a very bright white light on it.  the bottom of this object was flat and the dome shaped top had what may have been louvres spaced evenly on the surface.

we had no idea what this was at the time but stood and watched it as it moved without a sound from south to north.  the light on the antenna left a small trail.

the object suddenly dropped behind the tree line and we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Dark dome shaped object with light on top of an antenna over our home.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 3/9/2015 around 8pm my wife and i observed a strange light in the sw sky from our kitchen window. we went to our front porch and looked out the window. i saw a very bright star-like light in the sky. it was about 20 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be spinning or rotating. the light would brighten and then get dim...Brightened again...Then dimmed again. it was bobbing up and down...And side to side. i had saw this before in 2014. it started out as a bright speck of light that would appear high in the sky and very far away. i thought it was the planet venus, but it would get lower and closer to the horizon after about an hour. missouri mufon has investigated this case before. i suspect this sighting was the same object, or the same type of object. i didn't feel any physical effects because i had saw this before. i was not scared, just interested in the object as to what it could be. i did not get a chance to photograph or record this sighting.
content.summary: Bright star-like light that rotated and bobbed up and down in sw sky

content.detailedDescription: I can see university dr and the 202 on ramp from my backyard. last night, my daughter and a friend and i were in the backyard visiting, when i noticed a large orange ball of light approaching from the west, fairly low in the sky, headed east. i pointed it out to my friend and daughter. as it came closer, i had the distinct impression that it was a plane, and the engines were on fire, because it appeared to be plane-shaped, and the fire appeared to be in the area where the wings join the body of the plane. it made no noise like a plane does and appeared to be flying above the superstition freeway/us 60, about 2.25 miles south of our house. my daughter and friend thought it was a plane too because they remarked about it in the same manner. i tried to take a picture of it with my iphone 5s when it was close to us, but when i focused on the object, nothing appeared in the square. ( when i took my camera down, i could still see it quite well.) the ball of fire made a turn to the south as if it were headed for williams-gateway, but instead of going due south, it moved more to the southeast. as we watched, the flames started going out, then saw a shower of sparks and couldn't see it any more after that.  i called my husband (he wasn't home at the time) and asked him to get on the ham radio and see what the radio traffic was saying about it. he reported back later that he never heard anything. i called falcon field this morning and asked about a plane in distress and was told nothing of that nature had been reported. i called williams-gateway admin and they also said they had no reports of a plane in distress or a crash. i'm really concerned about this, it was a "horribly beautiful" sight in some ways and very scary to watch because i thought it was a plane on fire. i'm relieved it wasn't a plane on fire, but if it wasn't, what was it?
content.summary: Large ball of fire passed by my house, turned south, turned into sparks and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
In 2007 an friend and i were sitting on an old concrete boat ramp by the tennessee river looking at the stars on the clear autumn night. we had a six pack of beer and were both on our second beer each therefore we were not drunk or even feeling the effects of alcohol. 
 we had put our bottles in a crack in the concrete. we both looked up at the exact same time to see a triangle shaped craft literally appear out of nowhere about 200 feet from us, over the river and perhaps 75 feet above it. it was appox. the size of a 2 bedroom house. it had  white/bluish lights on each end and one yellowish light in the center. only a couple of seconds had passed when this object accelerated behind us. it didn't go directly over us but took a sweeping path around us. it flew in a "frisbee" motion.
 maybe 7-10 seconds had passed. my friend and i looked at each other and said "we have just seen a ufo". right after we had said that it sounded like all of the wildlife that was around us went crazy and were running from something. birds were very loud,crickets were loud and it sounded like a bunch of deer or maybe entities? were running right towards us. this frightened us greatly. so we jumped in my car and drove off very fast. about 15 minutes later curiosity got the best of us so we went back. we got out of the car and looked all around the sky. i happened to look down where our beer bottles were and they were gone! i looked for water lines to see if the river rose and were washed away. i could find absolutely no logical explanation for that. i knew who or whatever it was took them. perhaps for dna through saliva? i've no idea but this has messed with me since it has happened. i've even dreamed about it.
 this is by far the strangest experience i've ever had. i'm really looking for any type of answers i can find. if you've any questions feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Looking at stars. object materialized,flew behind us. animals went crazy . missing items

content.detailedDescription: I came home from work and like normal parked my car in my driveway and then as i always do looked up at the sky. i did a double take and noticed a hovering bright red craft. at first i thought it was my mind playing tricks on me but then i noticed how it was moving in a very peculiar manner. it would ascend and descend rapidly and move side to side. at one point there was an airplane in the distance that moved below it's path. i'm not sure if it's a drone or what but it was extremely bright and unlike any other drones i've seen. i wasn't scared but more stupefied. i've seen unusual things in the sky before but this really was unlike anything i'd seen before. anyhow, once i came to my senses i pulled out my cellphone and took a video. the video is over two minutes and i couldn't email it easily from my phone to upload here but there's also a second video. the reason there's a second video is because i saw the object descend and disappear so i began walking back home but just looked back in case and it had re-appeared. this video is a lot shorter but i took footage as long as i was still able to see it. i've posted this video on a few of my social media outlets and everyone insists it's a drone but i really don't feel that to be true. does anyone out there have any insight or have seen something similar?
content.summary: It was a bright craft that was vividly ascending and descending and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was drinking coffee in kitchen while looking out window. 11:20-11:40 am mt. spotted four star-like and mostly stationary objects that rapidly changed white and red and were able to disappear and appear. individually they stayed in the sky for about 5 to 7 minutes each. there was a devaition of about 10-20 degrees from when i spotted them in the west and northwest about 45 degrees above the horizon until they disappeared at bout 20-35 degrees. they moved in erratic directions, several degrees at a time, not in a common direction as you would suspect from the prevailing winds. they were at the altitude of the faint cirrostratus clouds.I took 8 pictures that show nothing more than a faint pixelated grey dot. they may have been mylar baloons, but i do not know for sure. question: do they pop at high altitudes which would explain why i saw them suddenly disappear? one appeared at its closest approach to have an octahedron shape (which rules out a common mylar baloon afaik).
content.summary: 4 separate red/white star-like objects, maximum 2 in the sky at a time might have had octahedron shape

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired law enforcement officer (1991).  on jan 29, 2015 my wife and i were traveling westward on nasa blvd approaching wickham rd (w. melbourne, florida) ( approximately 200' from the intersection), we were returning home from a late dinner near the mall in w. melbourne.  we both saw a green neon light approximately 75 to 100' above wickham rd.  the light was approximately the size of a traffic control signal light but more neon green in color.  the light moved like it was a baseball being thrown in an arc and dropped below the buildings on the west side of wickham rd.  we both expected to hear a crashing sound and see an explosion, but nothing occurred.  we turned right on wickham rd. and headed north slowly.  we both watched intently for any incident of a crash, but there wasn't any.  we then returned home and watched the news on tv, the newspapers, and on-line for any mention of others seeing the light and there weren't any reports.  we spoke to friends and relatives, asking if anyone heard anything like our sighting but nothing was seen.  we then seemed to get involved in our life (my wife has cancer and she is undergoing chemo treatments)and not really forgot about reporting the incident was delayed until now. the location of the sighting is on the western boarder of a runway of the melbourne international airport.  i have seen many airplanes landing in a easterly direction at that site but never taking off so i do not think it was an airplane, just 1 light not a series like on an airplane.
content.summary: Saw neon green light approximate size of a traffic signal light over wickham rd and it headed  west like a thrown baseball and drop out of sight behind buildings.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend who also wants to remain anonymous. she had seen this same object in the area on two occasions. i didn't believe her until tuesday morning when we were leaving her home to go for items at 24 hr grocery store. she said there it is again. it was hovering over an apartment complex off of custer road and the george bush tollroad. it descended into the complex. we made a u-turn to come around to get it on her iphone. it then popped up and hovered low over the train tracks for a matter of seconds then ascended again moving fast over to canyon creek baptist church/canyon creek christian academy where it hovered a few hundred feet in the air. she tried to get her phone to focus on it to get some video but her phone battery that was charged drained. we drove back around to the church in time to see in descend at a much closer distance. it was kind of rocking in the air as it slowly moved out over an area of nice homes and duplexes. it then descended quickly. we saw a police car in the parking lot of a shopping centre across the street from the housing complex where it descended. we then drove down the street next to the church just in time to see a blue streak of light come down in the same area. we parked and got out and saw "it" at the closest point we had seen it yet. it arose from behind the nice area of houses or an alley and hovered for a few seconds before streaking off at an angle that was almost straight up. the "object" was triangle shaped with no windows was black and grey similar to stealth jets. it was smaller than we first through maybe 15-18 feet wide and 25-30 feet long? the top angled up in sort of a flat pyramid dome with "slats". there were no lights and it did not reflect any of the lights. it was rainy outside and very overcast. we had seen a small plane fly over earlier but it would have been to long for them to have seen it. since my friend had seen this same object on several other occasions in this same area we were wondering if any other people have seen this object either? does anyone know what it is or what it was doing? i am not ready to believe in "aliens" yet and believe this is a secret government plane. she has a different opinion. neither of us have filed a report like this before and hope mufon will keep me anonymous because my father is well known in the area and a member of the canyon creek country club.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a

content.detailedDescription: I was on a bridge in my dad's car and he saw it first and pointed it out to me and it appeared to me a reverse image of the clouds in the shape of a parralelagram and it remained there till we where out of si gt of it after leaving the bridge and into a downtown area. but my father will state the same.
content.summary: Reverse parralelagram, like a malfunctioning cloak of some sort.. the clouds appeared reversed in the shape of a parralelagram

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work and before i turned on the frontage road to i25 i saw a bright green light in the sky about 200ft of the horizon heading south horizontal to the highway. it seemed faster in speed than an airplane and seemed to not be descending.
content.summary: Bright green light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Live in the country not far away from the county airport.  am very familiar with the sounds, lights and configurations of many aircraft.  one night i walked out to the road in front of my house and some lights in the sky caught my attention.  it was the size that a military cargo plane woud be at about 1500ft almost directly overhead.  however, it was totally silent.  also it had 3 white lights in a perfect equilateral triangle shape and one steady red light in the exact middle.  no flashing red and green navigation lights.  no flashing strobe lights.  all of which i see all the time on regular aircraft.  also, following directly behind and in the same direction was a single white light about 500 ft. behind, also totally silent.  what struck me was that their was no sound at all.  an aircraft of that size at that altitude wouid have made considerable engine or jet noise.  i watched them slowly dissapear into the east.  as for my feelings, once i determined that this was not a normal aircraft, i felt pretty elated having been able to witness it.
content.summary: Large, silent triangular object.  one white light at each corner.  one red light in the middle.  none flashing.  one white lit object following silently about 500' behind.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my job talking to a friend.  my friend asked my brother and i if that was an airplane because it seemed to be moving awfully fast.  we both looked up and thought he was talking about the planet next to the moon.  and then my friend said, "no, that one."  we looked south and saw, what seemed to be a very bright star or planet, moving at high velocity.  then it stopped mid air and hovered for a few seconds.  my brother said "no, that isn't a plane."  we stood there watching this light make sharp 90 degree turns in multiple directions.  this lasted for about 10 seconds.  i was a little bit in awe, when i realized i had to record this with my samsung galaxy s 4 phone. by the time i started recording it, it had stopped making its drastic maneuvers. it hovered in the air and made a course correction back to the southwest.  what you see in the video is the final moments of the object.  the object flew off at very high velocity back to the west.  it seemed as if it was falling but wasn't.
content.summary: That was a plane but was moving way to fast.  had no commercial lights.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling west bound on u.S. 34 between biggsville, il and burlington, ia. had just left the new four lane back on to the old two lane, about 6:52 am, when i noticed a very bright light about tree top high, slightly to my left. at this point the road descends into the mississippi river valley. i was able to keep it in my view as i preceded towards burlington. i have seen life flight helicopters from great river medical enroute to the iowa city hospitals. at first that's what i thought it was because all i could see was the bright lights, but once i cleared the trees along the highway and could clearly see the shape, i knew it wasn't that. the sky was starting to brighten with sun rise and i was able to discern the hockey puck shape with the lights across the top rim. traveled less than a mile when the object extinguished its lights and disappeared in front of my eyes at about 6:56 am. i continued to search the sky for several minutes with nothing to be seen.
content.summary: Hockey puck shaped with a bank of very bright lights at top

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were outside around 8pm testing a new telescope and binoculars we just bought. the sky was clear with no clouds. around 10pm, my wife says to me "i think i just saw a shooting star, but it's weird because is was to bright and bigger than a star, it moved fast and then stopped before turning off" when i look up to see what she was talking about, in the area she saw the light we saw 3 orange/red dots "turning on" forming a perfect triangle, it hovered for a few seconds before slowly started to move from north to south. once it passed in top of my house i was able to see better the triangular shape but the middle was transparent, you could see stars thru the middle of the 3 lights. what ever it was, it was very low and it was big, made no sound.
content.summary: Bright white

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the hot at around four in the morning, when i sew these lights (2) to the south west. i got out of the hut tub to get the house and get my phone. the lights were moving from sw to nw, than to then east where they appeared to get very close to the ground just north of our house. i started taking pictures when the objects were in the se moving ne towards our house. we have many pictures. i don't know what they are, but i know what they aren't. every picture also has rod's plus lights. iv'e also seen lights before, and something in the back yard when the lights occur. iv'e even head the the chain link fence rattle.  my husband and i have also seen that purple and blue light over whidbey that other people have have put on youtube. 
.
content.summary: Don't know what it was, but it's not a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at la jolla shores on 03/09/15 at 5:45pm we stopped and my husband got out of the car he took 2 consecutive pictures.  within a couple of minutes we arrived and parked at the beach.  we then reviewed the pictures and found a bright green orb on each picture in different locations. 
within 5 minutes after we parked, two f22 raptors fighter planes were in route to the area where we noticed the orb in the pictures.
content.summary: Hoovering light in the horizon at la jolla shores approching sunset

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to work and walked a block from home to catch the city bus. standing there for whatever reason i looked up and straight above my head was a little round dot way above my head. i lost interest. it was a still day not even a breeze so something motionless for a bit i didn't think would be so unusual. in about two minutes i looked up again and it was in the same spot. to me it looked like it had a red light that flickered on and off again for a few seconds then it moved what looked like higher. i took a picture with my phone and while i could see it with my eyes i couldnt see it in the picture. then i couldnt see it at all because it had vanished. a moment later i saw it move down and move along the horizon north of me, still well above the ground and away from me. at brief seconds above me again. i decided to run video to try and catch it that way. about 35 seconds later i stopped recording and gave up. the next day i decided to take a closer look at the picture and the video. in the portion of the sky i thought i had seen the object i enlarged it greatly and did find a small dot what seemed like miles in the sky. i went to the video and did the same thing. just toward the end of the video i kept seeing a streak that flashed across the sky. on closer look i found what i believe to be the same object entering the field of view(during the 33rd sec and frame by frame) at tremendous speed,from lower left to upper right, traversing that part of the sky in less than a split second before turning straight up and vanishing. if you do not look at the video frame by frame you will not see it, its moving so fast. from the same point of entry in the video you can greatly enlarge the photo. it is there but you may or may not be able to find it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Caught on hd video at my bus stop during the afternoon

content.detailedDescription:
You need to know.  my sighting was one day, the events in this area lasted one year.
i am a retired teacher of physics, chemistry and math,i was at the farm of 
a friend,who was a supervisor at a chemical plant i once worked at. he lured me there with out telling me the real reason why [i was a disbeliever!!! in ufo's then]
   at dawn a light appeared in the corner of his field. it was 2ft. above ground and  followed a natural drain at the pace of a rapid walk.
after moving 400yards it paused and fired straight up at bullet like speed.
it then entered a door and i saw it no more. a minute or so later, the second object appeared in the same place, again it preceded on the same path at the same speed and again there was no sound.  however this time i had a large rock ready and was amazed when there was no sound when the rock hit the object.  again the object repeated the actions of the first and so did the four others that followed

my friend has the highest security clearance that a civialion can have, since he works in atomic energy plants.
my friend saw these objects many times as did many of his relatives over a period of almost a year.

the above is only the tip of the iceburg, and typing is difficult for me if you wish the rest of the  story,please call

p.S. i know of 4 other unreported and unrelated sightings
content.summary: I saw 6 ufo's viewed one at a time,with 2 min. between sightings they were 2/3ft bove the ground  moving at low speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my deck smoking a cigarette. i looked up and saw a very bright orb with 6 beam like lights shooting off that almost resembled the star of david.
my first thought was that is not a planet it was way to big and bright. the object just hovered there to the naked eye, but when i tried to zoom in on it with my cell phone it appeared to pulse and become larger then smaller. it also appeared to make small zig zags.At that time i was kinda confused at what i was looking at. i then went and got two of my aunts that were at my house to see what they thought it was. we all agreed that it was not an airplane, helicopter or planet. i lost sight of it in the trees when it finally started to move off towards the nw
content.summary: Bright orb with 6 beam like lights shooting off

content.detailedDescription:
Mar 8/15
camping at horne lake prov campsite watching for moon to rise as previous night   my wife asked about 2 satellites she could see  asking if they usually moved together     she pointed them out   they were very dim and moving aprox north to south    i felt i could see faint satellite more overhead was not moving in straight line and was very faint  so disregarded  then i saw what she was pointing out there was a quick short meteor right where the two satellites were  then i no longer saw them    continuing to watch  i saw a very bright star in the west that seemed to be moving south to north approx  as though approaching us   flashing with blue and red at times  the not moving  sometimes seeming to change shape  then moving up down side to side erratic   my wife walked away   then like a meteor came out of it horizontally to the north    short and fast   i said did you see that   no   my wife watched for a while   then went into the camper  as she did not want to see or think about what we were looking at  i watched for a while   it continued to move   jump around  and hover  when i went in i could still se it and checked a few times from the window   very puzzling
content.summary: Saw 2 sattlites together then meteor then larger star like object emit meteor hover and move eratically

content.detailedDescription: At 7:45pm, 10/3/2015, letting dogs out the back door, when i noticed a really bright light in the sky in-front of me, it had been there for three nights, so i got my iphone out and took a sequence of pictures and noticed it was changing shape. have a 3 minutes video of it as well as pictures. it was amazing to watch and here i thought it was just a star, ran in and showed my mother oh just kept saying that,s is weird and so beautiful. please if any one wants to inspect the video clip let me know i will send it to you, to be tested for authenticity. if anyone can tell me what they think.
content.summary: Absolutly amazing to watch and when downloaded onto computer it was a wow reaction.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Walking home
2.It landing
3.I thought it was a car
4.The object landed dropped off a alien then later the alien went back on and the object left
5.I was sacred for my life so i hid under a car
6.It zoomed up not turning 
a ufo  landed and this weird looking man came out and told a bunch of kids to get back into the school he pulled out a weapon and aimed it at the kids put a teacher came out and stopped the alien just in time.Then the alien went of in its ship and shot the school and all the peoples memories inside were wiped.
content.summary: Landed then alien came to school the left.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon.

i'm living in norway. in the year 1969 i came over a magazine called
illustrated sience, which was released in norway, and was put out to the
public eatch month.
i wrote an article about the famous ufo crash in roswell at that time.
the farmer, who was the first person on the crash site, find a piece of
the ufo's body, and took it to his house.
when he examined this piece, he find out that when he put a light source
at the fragment of the piece, he noticed that small light points came
out on the other site of the fragment. when he examined it futher, he
found out that the lights followed through the fragment, with tiny mirrors
which was standing in a quid position agains eatch others, and let the
light goes through the fragment, from one side to the other. the farmer
could not understand what this was made for, but he made a drawing about
what he discovered. at the time a saw this article, and the comments about
it, no one understand at this point, what this was or could be.
at the end of the 1990s, i was working in a saving bank, here in my home
town troms. the boss at the it department in the bank, told me that they
should installed a new computer system, which include a new system with
something he called fiber cables. i ask him about this new tecnology, and
want to see how it worked.  when he showed me the drawings on these fiber
cables, i got some of a shock. it was exactly the same as i saw illustarted in this sience magazine in 1969.
i have seen many tv programs about the roswell incident, but never have
seen something mentioned about these fiber cables found on this ufo.
this convinced me that the ufo crash at roswell was very real, and that
the goverment in usa, holds back informations about this ufo crash.
i think this issue could have some interest for you, and your work around
ufo cases.
best wishes from
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Grey and round and flat

content.detailedDescription: Seen it by the sun

I was sleeping in my bed . my son 10 year old son was on top of bunk bed . i was awakened by our dog barking outside of bedroom door which i lock out of habit every night .The door was being banged on ,and shaking as someone was breaking in . i was on my back , and raise my head up as the door flung open .i saw white mist and could see the tops of two light colored heads . i thought o my god their aliens , i thought i was dreaming . the dog was goin crazy . he is a small dog . i heard him yelp ,and silence , and i thought in my head they killed him . at that moment i tried to get out of bed ,but i couldnt i was paralyzed. i couldnt talk . at that moment i heard a male type voice in my head say no ,we didnt harm him . now the light from hallway dimmed . i saw top of two heads seem to float ,or walk with smooth steps tby top of bottom bunk . i was waiting for them to come around to the side . when i didnt see them.Who are you? it asked me where is the little one ? i said hes not hear ,but it read my mind ,and said telepathicly "up top". i thought who are you ,where are you from ,and what do you want ? it replied "you would not understand "   " curious " examine "  . i thought " i cannot see you " at that point it put its hand in over me chest hi ,and to in front of my face ,  , the light from my air purifier enabled me to see its long , boney fingers . i think i saw three fingers , one had a circuler tip . then it ducked its head in , and i said "oh god" . it looked like (et)!!!!. all this happened in less than a minute . my son ,and i dont seem to have any marks , or anything wrong , however i notice the bottom of my scrotum has been shaved . i need to talk to someone about this  it was not a dream !!!! i do not drink ,or do drugs . sincerily , [item moved/cms/nd] ps.(both doors are damaged) i never really believed the stories . i do now . i saw with my bown eyes !!!!!
content.summary: Beings

content.detailedDescription:
I was all set up that evening to take a photo of the lights over the town of landers from the perspective of my property. i had my tripod set, and used an 80-200 mm lens with a nikon d90 camera body. it was shot around 125 mm.

as i was taking shots and adjusting exposure times, a meteor shower became visible. i simply hit the shutter, never seeing the object in the left upper field of the photo.

the next morning when i downloaded the camera, i was shocked by what looked like a jet smoke stream running across one of the frames. however, when i blew up the image, it proved not to be a smoke or vapor stream at all.

it was a series of lights ranging in every color imaginable, broken up into little square shaped boxes, that appear to slow down suddenly, change direction, and eject something.

the strange thing is that i never saw the object in real time. i only captured its existence in my nikon. 

in the original photo, there is a telephone pole in the forefront. i eventually went into photoshop, and removed the pole, because the photo went right onto wikipedia in the ufo article as well as others, and i wanted better composition for its debut. 

the photo i am sending you, is the original j-peg i saved "before" i took the telephone pole out. no one else to date has this photo but you. the only difference from the absolute original (i still have), is that the photo is cropped to eliminate unnecessary foreground.
content.summary: During a 4 second long exposure to capture a meteor shower, the image was on the exposure, but never seen by the human eye while it was happening.

content.detailedDescription:
As i drove up the road that parallels hwy 26 in boring, oregon on the morning of march 9, 2015 i noticed two illuminated orbs paralleling my drive.

there was no sound, and they were very bright. they traveled next to me for a mile or more before the front, smaller orb moved toward the rear, larger orb and then turned north and disappeared.
content.summary: Two white orbs in a line with rear orb larger that paralleled my track and speed

content.detailedDescription: I was going threw the pictures on the trail cam i had on a pole to see what kind of action pictures of birds i could get and happened to notice something in the sky. as i went threw more pictures i found more. i thought it was birds, but as i watched the buzzards and others for a few days i never seen any of the birds ever look like a ball. i don't think they are anything but i would like to know what it is. in one picture it looks like a shiny spot.
content.summary: Recorded on a trail camera off my deck faceing a bird feeder and in middle pasture taking pictures of snowi

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
As i walked outside late friday night to smoke a cigarette, i noticed a sphere shaped object with many different color lights hovering about 500 feet from the ground and maybe a quarter mile from me . looking at something i've never seen  it grabbed my attention . as i stood there to observe it and try to come up with an explanation as to what it could of been,i was soon convinced that it was very different from the planes and such that i normally see since the airport is about a mile from where i stayed.As the object hovered in one spot and its different color lights were flashing it quickly moved in a weird pattern covering about a half a mile in less than a second then stopping like it hit a wall and continued to make this weird pattern of flight for about 20 seconds then it slows down almost coming back to where i originally spotted it.I never heard anything from it. as it slowed down hovering but moving very slow  it started heading to my right and away from me. it started to move behind the neighbors pine trees across the street to where i started walking to my left so that i could see it clearly again . when i moved enough to my left to get a full view again it quickly comes back to where i first spotted it except it was a little closer to me this time.I almost felt as if it seen me and was making it clear it seen me as well when it came back from behind the trees and right back in the same place i originally seen it but closer to me that had me on fairs,so hearing stories of abductions and etc.I quickly went back inside where i looked out the window from inside and got to see it head south east very very quickly.The 
whole incident had deffenitiy spooked me as every hair on my body had stood up as i felt overwhelmed by what i had just witnessed.Almost a year later i saw a very bright light which seemed to be coming from the woods behind my house but this time i only seen a light . however there is an airport not far at all from my ufo sighting .The only thing that didn't make sense a year later was that i know airports have a bunch of lights but the one i saw ,i've never seen a light that bright and in  that section of the woods .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft was at first hovering then moving quickly in a weird pattern and changing direction quickly  then slowly returning to first sight where it remained to hover but moving slowly coming
